title: US deputy health secretary: Vaccine guidelines are still subject to change
description: Following publication of this story, Politico reported Jim O’Neill would be leaving his current roles within the Department of Health and Human Services. Over the past year, Jim O’Neill has become one of the most powerful people in public health. As the US deputy health secretary, he holds two roles at the top of the…
